attributes.action: get justice and compensation for the victims who had their cars confiscated by HM Customs & Excise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of victims had their vehicles confiscated and were labelled bootleggers by HM Customs. All they were doing was exercising their rights by buying goods in another EU Country. A huge amount of people have never recieved compensation for their loss.
